about_the_game:
In this fun and addictive game, your goal is to stack a variety of ingredients to build the tallest burger possible.

Each layer of buns, patties, lettuce, cheese, and more must be carefully balanced, and as the burger grows, the challenge increases.

                       

With simple and intuitive controls, it's a captivating experience that tests your precision and reflexes.

                         

In the FINAL VERSION OF THE GAME, you will compete in the global leaderboard to see who can build the tallest burger tower!

Whether you're aiming to beat your own high scores or compete with friends, this quirky burger-stacking adventure promises delicious and guaranteed fun!"
detailed_description:
In this fun and addictive game, your goal is to stack a variety of ingredients to build the tallest burger possible.

Each layer of buns, patties, lettuce, cheese, and more must be carefully balanced, and as the burger grows, the challenge increases.

                       

With simple and intuitive controls, it's a captivating experience that tests your precision and reflexes.

                         

In the FINAL VERSION OF THE GAME, you will compete in the global leaderboard to see who can build the tallest burger tower!

Whether you're aiming to beat your own high scores or compete with friends, this quirky burger-stacking adventure promises delicious and guaranteed fun!"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 15 or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

name: Big Burger Tower Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: Intel Celeron and up
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any integrated device and up
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: How high can you stack ingredients to build the tallest burger before it all comes crashing down?! Test your skills in this fun game! Join the ranking challenge and compete to see who can build the biggest burger!
